sentences.sContent: What differentiates these two periods of history?
sentences.sCn: 这两个历史时期的差别在哪里？

sentences.sContent: A child may not differentiate between his imagination and the real world.
sentences.sCn: 孩子也许无法区分想像与真实世界的差别。

words.tran: 分化型；已分化的；可区分的
[数] 可微的；可辨的；可区分的
变异，[生物] 分化；区别
[自] 微分器；微分电路；区分者

trans.tranOther: to recognize or express the difference between things or people

trans.tranCn: 区分； 使不同， 使有差异
trans.tranOther: If you differentiate between things or if you differentiate one thing from another, you recognize or show the difference between them
